author: Nick Clark
title: Coronavirus forces postponement of crucial UN climate summit
description: The COP26 negotiations were scheduled to take place in the British city of Glasgow in November.
content:
This year's United Nations global climate summit is being postponed because of the coronavirus pandemic, host country the United Kingdom has said.
The most important climate summit since Paris 2015, also called COP26, was scheduled to take place in the Briti… [+3009 chars]
